metadata.job_title: Sr. Data Engineer(hands on Palantir exp.)

seniority_level.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Sr. Data Engineer' and requires 8-10 years of experience, which aligns with senior level in data engineering hierarchy.

job_family.evidence: Job title is 'Sr. Data Engineer' and responsibilities focus on data engineering tools and platforms (Palantir Foundry, Hadoop, Hive, PySpark).

sub_specialty.evidence: Mentions Hadoop, Hive, and PySpark — technologies typically used for batch ETL pipelines rather than real-time streaming.

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of people management, mentoring, or architectural leadership; role appears focused on hands-on implementation.

primary_cloud.evidence: Mentions Hadoop-based technologies (Hive, PySpark) which are typically deployed on-premise or in private clusters; no cloud providers listed.

secondary_clouds.evidence: No cloud platforms mentioned in skills or requirements.

processing_paradigm.evidence: Hadoop, Hive, and PySpark are primarily used for batch processing; no streaming technologies (Kafka, Flink, Kinesis) mentioned.

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestration tools (Airflow, Dagster, Prefect, etc.) mentioned in must-have or nice-to-have skills.

storage_layer.evidence: Hadoop ecosystem implies data lake architecture (HDFS, Hive) rather than warehouse or lakehouse; no modern lakehouse formats (Delta, Iceberg) mentioned.

remote_restriction.evidence: Explicitly states 'Looking for locals only for onsite' and location is Atlanta, GA — implies regional restriction.

timezone_focus.evidence: Location restricted to Atlanta, GA, and 'locals only' implies US-based, specifically Georgia.

relocation_required.evidence: Requires 'locals only for onsite' — implies candidate must already be in Atlanta or willing to relocate.

h1b_friendly.evidence: No mention of visa sponsorship; 'locals only' and onsite requirement suggest preference for candidates already authorized to work in US without sponsorship.

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visas; 'locals only' and 8-10 years experience requirement make OPT/CPT unlikely to be supported.

citizenship_required.evidence: No explicit citizenship requirement, but 'locals only' and onsite work imply authorization to work in US is required.

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Onsite role with 8-10 years experience suggests full-time W2 employment; no mention of contract or 1099 status.

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits listed in Pass 1 extraction or job description.

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No mention of career progression, promotion paths, or growth opportunities in job description or Pass 1 data.

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mention of mentorship, coaching, or working with senior staff in job description or extracted data.

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotions, advancement, or career ladder in job posting or Pass 1 data.

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, role changes, or mobility opportunities.

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks (IC, management, architect, etc.) mentioned in job description or extracted data.

requirement_strictness.evidence: All listed skills are 'must-have' with no 'nice-to-have' items; 8-10 years experience is a strict requirement.

scope_definition.evidence: Role is narrowly defined around Palantir Foundry and Hadoop ecosystem; no hybrid or multi-role responsibilities mentioned.

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Senior level (8-10 years) with specific, realistic skills (Palantir, Hadoop, Hive, PySpark) — no unrealistic combinations or junior-for-senior expectations.
